DOC.brief_summary: An aberrometer measure visual aberration map light ray travel eye provide map use colored gradient represent magnitude refractive error eye . The purpose study compare 4 different aberrometers -Wavescan ( Visx Technology ) , Zywave ( Bausch & Lomb ) , Ladarwave aberrometer ( Alcon Inc. ) Allegro Analyzer ( Alcon Inc ) . In particular , investigator propose focus ability device display high order visual aberration compare quality output 4 device normal healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Four Different Aberrometers Evaluation Higher Order Visual Aberrations
